text: “Pitch In” to support the NLBM while we’re closed due to the Coronavirus pandemic! For every $10, or more, gift we receive while we’re closed, we’ll donate FREE ADMISSION to students when we open! Please donate at https://t.co/RrycwR6zdv! @MLB @Royals @MLB_PLAYERS @JPosnanski RT https://t.co/tHkeQoKZHp

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
